metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14368 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Exiv2 0.27.99.0 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Exiv2::RafImage::readMetadata() in rafimage.cpp.

notes.Note: leosilva> same as CVE-2019-13504 vulnerability introduced by https://github.com/Exiv2/exiv2/commit/c72d16f4c402a8acc2dfe06fe3d58bf6cf99069e

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
